title: Research subagent best practices for token savings
description:
Research using Haiku and Sonnet subagents in Claude Code to save tokens. Investigate:
- What tasks are appropriate for each model tier (Haiku vs Sonnet vs Opus)
- Claude Code subagent features and limitations
- Best practices for delegating tasks
- Recommend specific changes we could make to our skills/workflows

Save research for discussion.

actions.note: Research saved to .claude/state/research/subagent-best-practices.md. Covers pricing (Haiku 5x cheaper than Opus), subagent mechanics, task delegation map, proposed custom subagent configs, and estimated ~70% cost savings with optimized delegation.
